title: JSW MG Motor India to drive into luxury car market
description: JSW MG Motor India plans to enter the luxury car segment with new energy vehicles, including electric, hybrid, and plug-in hybrids. The company aims to offer accessible luxury through its MG Select brand, starting in 2025. Despite the dominance of German brands, JSW MG seeks to disrupt the market with innovative offerings.
